comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: Quote from: saotchynakamuro on December 12, 2022, 07:57:03 AMI hacked Satoshi NakamotoYou hacked his system? I always knew he must be a bot. Can you alter his program somehow? Would be fun to see him do April fool pranks on the network like we get here.Quote from: saotchynakamuro on December 12, 2022, 07:57:03 AMIn theory, Satoshi could revoke all of my access, but it appears that he does not want to, or is unable to do so.He might be enjoying the new programmer better than the old. Must have been the F.B.I  Quote from: saotchynakamuro on December 12, 2022, 07:57:03 AMI can tell you that Satoshi Nakamoto is alive and well, and he is not any of the people who the public previously suspected him to be.Rules out CSW. That is good news at least.- Jay -

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: I just wish the thread got locked because after OP has posted his garbage still went ajead to edit the whole content and title, i think we've got enough threads about such troll already and it's high time moderators should be taken drastic actions on such related by locking, moving or deleting them, why should you OP make a thread and then later change all about it which is obvious that you're just but only creating a troll.
